attributes.action: Bring in a law forbidding any politician to give away the UK'S sovereignty.
attributes.additional_details: I have witnessed over the past 40 years politicians signing away to foreign powers,  parliamentary powers and therefore the freedom and sovereignty of this country Which the people faught and died for in their millions.
attributes.background: To make it impossible for any politician or group to be able to fritter away the sovereignty of this country ever again. This should be made an act of treason with the most severe punishment available to be administered mandatorally.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
